channel.title: [Release] RSC-Coordinate Locator
channel.description:
Written in Visual Basic6
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2cxcei0.png[/img]
Left click & hold to drag map around Right click to set(get) coordinates (Wont let you get coords out of bounds)
Thought this would be a pretty cool admin command, you type ::map ingame, and it brings this up, drag around, double click and teleport there :P
Included vb6 source code if people actually want to use this and modify how it works, I included the double click function, just need to add a custom method to communicate with your Server, I thought about having an .ini file with 3 inputs, and 3 outputs and read via reading the text file.. but meh it's interesting :P If anyone wants me to do this for them & can't code visual basic just comment with how you want it to work and i'll write the code for you, I might add a map-marker, and include tile data so it tells you wether you click on grass , gameobjects etc
But the objective is to call the command ingame, double click where you want to go, and it teleports you, or just a quick way of getting coords (:
Credits - Myself & Vortex for hooking me up with the map image
Link: http://www.multiupload.com/PQ1P3R634Z
Have fun

Hi, Yes this is quite old im sorry i don’t have it anymore. Anyone with basic skills should be able to recreate this… It was more of an idea than a finished project.

Your an idiot.
[/quote]How is he an idiot? What have you contributed to this small community? Oh wait I know, I’ll just do a quick search on topics you’ve made.

[ul][li]Stolen website content[/li]
[li]Help declaring a beanshell function[/li]
[li]How to be a complete noob[/li]
[li]How to locate a file on disk[/li]
[li]How to decrypt MySQL passwords (lol’d irl at this one)[/li][/ul]

Those are just to name a few. Seriously, shut the hell up and get off these forums if all you do it talk shit to people when you are a complete idiot yourself.

QFT

Good laughs in them threads[/quote]
